content.text: I am about to finish school and I have been thinking about my options. Adults always talk about how hard they have been working and how much money they have been making during their professional lives. Still, I do not consider they have been focusing enough on the most important things, such as: Have they been enjoying what they do? Have they been becoming better professionals along the way? Have they been improving the world around them through their actions? I mean, there should be a bigger reward to what you do for eight hours a day or more than a salary. I have been analyzing deeply what I want to do in the near future, but I still do not have answers.
